name: part_002
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY2】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage3 DAY2【チラ見せ】 [CVYbI-1IJnM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: A montage showcasing a message board filled with handwritten 'Capture the Moment' messages from hololive members and fans.
Pre-show waiting screen for 'hololive stage3 DAY2' followed by an 'Attention' screen with venue rules.
Merchandise introduction segment featuring hololive products from Bandai and Bandai Spirits.

subtitles.original: The concert will be starting soon.
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上 照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Due to production reasons, please be aware of flashing lights.

subtitles.original: 声出し応援 OK です
バンダイ、バンダイスピリッツより
エキスポ会場でも展示中の

subtitles.english: on display at the Expo venue.
